title: How to Open a Pages File on an Android Device

steps.title: Navigate to https://cloudconvert.com/ in your Android web browser.
steps.content: Navigate to https://cloudconvert.com/ in your Android web browser. Chrome is the default browser on most Androids, but you can use any browser you wish. If you haven’t already downloaded the .pages file to your Android, you’ll need to do so first. If you don’t have Google Docs or Microsoft Word, download one of them free from the Play Store . You’ll need one of these apps to open the converted file.

steps.title: Tap Select Files.
steps.content: Tap Select Files . This opens your Android’s file manager.

steps.title: Select the .pages file you want to open.
steps.content: Select the .pages file you want to open. This uploads the file to the server.

steps.title: Tap the select format button.
steps.content: Tap the select format button. A drop-down menu containing different file types will appear.

steps.title: Tap docx.
steps.content: Tap docx . If you prefer, you could convert it to a PDF.

steps.title: Tap Start Conversion.
steps.content: Tap Start Conversion . It’s the red button. The file will now convert to the new format. Once the conversion is complete, the “Start Conversion” button will turn green and say “Download.”

steps.title: Tap Download.
steps.content: Tap Download . This downloads the file to the Downloads folder on your Android.

steps.title: Tap the file in your Downloads folder.
steps.content: Tap the file in your Downloads folder. The file will now open in Google Docs or Microsoft Word.
